title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 218-3.2 - Fleet average reporting and projection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 218-3.2 - Fleet average reporting and projection

State Regulations

Commencing with the 1996 model year, each manufacturer
must report to the Department, using the same format used to report this
information to CARB, the average emissions of its fleet delivered for sale in

New York. Reports must be submitted to the Department by March
1
st
of the calendar year succeeding the end of the
model year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
218-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
